Version 1.17.1 Mutt integration tweaks

Two fairly minor issues are fixed in this version. The first is a tweak to the output of the mutt command, improving the understandability and usefulness of the user-facing text. The second is a bit of output sanitisation to help out people unlucky enough to have an address book where some of the contacts’ fields contain ^M carriage return characters.

  • Tweaked the output of the mutt command
  • Add output sanitisation removing all ^M characters from all output
